title: 1965 - LHD California Import - 11 Window Micro Bus

posts.content:
1965 - LHD California Import - Split Screen Camper £7500.00 ono

Split Screens like this are getting harder and harder to find, especially in this condition.

Apart from not being in its original colour this bus is a very straight and solid example and requires only minor renovation.
The chassis is extremely solid with only minor welding needed to pass an MoT.
This bus would make a fantastic ‘Ratty’ or a great ‘Base Project’ for restoration as it has a fitted transmission, but no engine.








Outside Description

• The original green paint has been over painted in a 1970's style brown and cream combination which has a nice faded patina and apart from lots of minor dents there is minimal rust
• The chassis is in excellent condition but the outriggers will need replacing
• The front clip is dented but is generally very good and more importantly solid without rust • The front skirt is solid and without rust • Passenger door is solid inside and out
• The dog legs are in very good condition
• Drivers door is solid inside and out
• The long panel is super straight and in excellent condition, there has been a repair to the lower 4"
• Left rear corner is mostly good with some lower rust
• Right rear corner is mostly good with some lower rust
• The battery tray will need replacing
• The engine surround is missing
• The engine deck-lid is good
• The cargo doors are very good
• Rear bumper is missing
• The roof is solid with no holes or major dents in it

Inside Description

• The Cab floor has the normal rust in it
• The Cargo floor have some rust damage, however it is mainly good
• There are front seats are present
• The interior is missing

Mechanics Description

• The brakes are kind working but will need a full overhaul
• The engine is missing
• The gearbox is present but untested

All UK customs charges have been paid.
The vehicle comes with the correct documentation ready for registration.
Buyer collects / for an additional fee we can help with transport if required.
Bus is located in Plymouth, Devon, UK.

Please PM for further details / more pictures
Reduced to £7000.00 for a quick sale
